item.title: About
item.description: A independent security researcher & developer auditing smart contracts for a living… Things I believe Link to heading Form is everything Excess in moderation Think less Think less AI will be transformative, soon, and it may not go well Choosing to care about silly things (especially communities) is important Strength before weakness Things gonna be more hardcore Quotes I Like Link to heading “Given enough eyeballs, all bugs are shallow”

item.title: Projects
item.description: Account Abstraction - Minimal Account Abstraction implementation on Ethereum & ZKSync

item.title: The War of Art
item.description: Author : Steven Pressfield Book Link : The War of Art: Break Through the Blocks and Win Your Inner Creative Battles “The War of Art” is a concise, engaging, and practical guide to success in any creative field. It serves as a modern Sun-Tzu for the soul, addressing the internal obstacles that prevent us from achieving our goals. Bestselling novelist Steven Pressfield identifies the inner enemy we all face, provides a battle plan to overcome it, and explains how to achieve the highest level of creative discipline.
